error.message: Call to deprecated function entity_view(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use the entity view builder's view() method for creating a render array:

Parameter $entity_manager of method Drupal\ajax_form_entity\Form\SettingsForm::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to ajax_form_entity.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
